title: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 20 hours of battery life.
fullDescription: Experience immersive sound with our latest wireless headphones. Designed for comfort and long listening sessions, featuring active noise cancellation, Bluetooth 5.0, and a 20-hour battery life.

title: Smartwatch
description: Track your fitness, monitor your heart rate, and stay connected on the go.
fullDescription: Stay on top of your health and notifications with this smartwatch. Monitor heart rate, track steps, sleep, and receive notifications directly on your wrist.

title: Gaming Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with RTX graphics, 16GB RAM, and a 1TB SSD for smooth gaming.
fullDescription: A high-performance gaming laptop equipped with RTX graphics, 16GB RAM, and a 1TB SSD for fast load times. Perfect for gaming and content creation.

title: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable speaker with deep bass, waterproof design, and 12 hours of playtime.
fullDescription: Enjoy music anywhere with this portable Bluetooth speaker. Deep bass, waterproof design, and up to 12 hours of battery life for endless entertainment.
